example.parse: (SBARQ (WHADVP-2 (REL_ADV كيف) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نحشر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC انفس) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا) (ADVP-MNR (ADV هكذا) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN الزوايا) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الضيقة) (SBAR-TMP (SUB_CONJ بينما) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM التوقعات) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حول) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تنذر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الزلزال) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العظيم) (ADVP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-2) (PUNC ?)

arg.g: while predictions surrounding us warn of a tremendous earthquake

example.arg: بينما التوقعات من حولنا تنذر بالزلزال العظيم
